x-codeSamples.source:
Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

opts = {
  channel_id: "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d",
  after: "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d",
  start_date: Helo::ActivityEventsListStartDateParameter.new,
  end_date: Helo::ActivityEventsListStartDateParameter.new,
  limit: 56
}
Helo::ActivityEvents.list(opts)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

generate_api_credential_request = Helo::GenerateApiCredentialRequest.new
Helo::APICredentials.create(generate_api_credential_request)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

opts = {
  channel_id: "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d",
  name: "name_example",
  limit: 56,
  offset: 56
}
Helo::APICredentials.list(opts)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
update_api_credential_request = Helo::UpdateApiCredentialRequest.new
Helo::APICredentials.update(id, update_api_credential_request)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::APICredentials.retrieve(id)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::APICredentials.delete(id)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

create_user_request = Helo::CreateUserRequest.new
Helo::Users.create(create_user_request)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

opts = {
  limit: 56,
  offset: 56,
  name: "name_example",
  email: "email_example",
  role: "role_example"
}
Helo::Users.list(opts)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
update_user_request = Helo::UpdateUserRequest.new
Helo::Users.update(id, update_user_request)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::Users.retrieve(id)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::Users.delete(id)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

channel_id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
create_smtp_user_request = Helo::CreateSmtpUserRequest.new
Helo::SMTPUsers.create(channel_id, create_smtp_user_request)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

channel_id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
opts = {
  limit: 56,
  offset: 56,
  name: "name_example"
}
Helo::SMTPUsers.list(channel_id, opts)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
channel_id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
smtp_user_update_request = Helo::SmtpUserUpdateRequest.new
Helo::SMTPUsers.update(id, channel_id, smtp_user_update_request)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
channel_id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::SMTPUsers.retrieve(id, channel_id)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
channel_id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::SMTPUsers.delete(id, channel_id)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

create_channel_request = Helo::CreateChannelRequest.new({ name: "name_example", delivery_type: Helo::DeliveryType::LIVE })
Helo::Channels.create(create_channel_request)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

opts = {
  limit: 56,
  offset: 56,
  name: "name_example",
  channel_ids: [ "inner_example" ],
  delivery_type: "live"
}
Helo::Channels.list(opts)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
update_channel_request = Helo::UpdateChannelRequest.new
Helo::Channels.update(id, update_channel_request)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::Channels.retrieve(id)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::Channels.delete(id)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

create_domain_request = Helo::CreateDomainRequest.new
Helo::Domains.create(create_domain_request)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

opts = {
  limit: 56,
  offset: 56
}
Helo::Domains.list(opts)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
update_domain_request = Helo::UpdateDomainRequest.new
Helo::Domains.update(id, update_domain_request)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::Domains.retrieve(id)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::Domains.delete(id)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::Domains.verify(id)

Helo.configure do |config|
  config.access_token = "YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN"
end

id = "38400000-8cf0-11bd-b23e-10b96e4ef00d"
Helo::Domains.rotate_key(id)
